title: Sheltered Gloom
story: The heavy cloud cover settles over the castle, dampening the air and muting sounds. While the gloom makes it harder to see, it provides a deceptive veil of security from prying eyes.
effect: During this Day phase, Sade (Red Sister) cannot drain Health from heroes resting in the Master Bedroom. However, the oppressive dampness causes heroes resting in *any* Bedroom (First Tower, Master, Second Tower) to lose 1 Willpower at the end of each turn they spend resting, as the cold seeps into their bones.
